ai-atk-vin02a310:1_0: Discussion of the lesser training rules
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_1: The chapter on the group of five hundred
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_2: Unless the four rules on expulsion, the rest are inclusively by each other, and because of the five hindrances.
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_3: This is the ascetics who follow.
ai-atk-vin02a310:2_4: bound like the plenty of water.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_0: Then, Reverend Ānanda, the boiled fine cloth, and the senior mendicant presented by you this, saying: ‘You have spoken well.’ He said,
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_1: Though they don’t know about offenses, nor do they know the attainment of stream-entry.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_3: ‘He doesn’t lay down new rules, nor should he gets rid of the existing ones.’
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_4: You also teach this to the extent of it’s hard for me to know. Then I acknowledge it like that, but I’ve taught it.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_5: But when there’s no a senior monk, he doesn’t ask about it or swallowing what is poorly said. He doesn’t reveal it to the breast, but because he’s not played. Then the senior mendicant, the junior mendicants will give rise to confidence in those without it, and then show it to the senior venerable.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_7: These are the four things that prevent them from the rest.
ai-atk-vin02a310:3_8: Whatever sourced should be spoken of.
